creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
description: Panel, small, velvet, rose ground, original design in green. Green grosgrain lining, stained. Velvet much worn and faded and cracked along center fold. A few breaks darned. Unlike most Chinese velvets of this period, the pile is the same length in both pattern and field.
title: Panel
